titles.title: LIFETIME Act
A bill to award grants to States for the development of innovative long-term services and supports programs.
LIFETIME Act
Living Independently for Extended Time Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Living Independently for Extended Time Act or the LIFETIME Act
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants to enable eligible states to develop innovative programs to meet the unique need for long-term services and supports in the state.
